Plot: [ ] “In a matter of minutes on a Friday night, I lost my school, my identity, the security of my first love, the personality of my sweet fearless brother, my best friend, my town, everything as I knew it. Everything changed.” "Minutes—that’s all it takes to change your entire life. How do you deal with that?” For high school senior Jules Blacklin surviving the storm is only the beginning. Faced with the new reality of her life, she must find a way to rise From The Wreckage and answer the question—how do you get back to normal, when everything that was normal is gone? From the Wreckage is a Young Adult to New Adult trilogy with multiple character spin-offs. Please see the reading order below: Jules and West's story 1. From the Wreckage 2. Out of Ruins 3. All that Remains Spin offs best read in order but CAN be read alone 4. West: A POV novel of From the Wreckage 5. Into the Fire: Dani's story 6. After the Fall: Austin's story
